broad.core.sequence
Class FastaSequenceIO

java.lang.Object
  broad.core.sequence.FastaSequenceIO

public class FastaSequenceIO
extends java.lang.Object

Suppose to be a very generic and smart Fasta manipulation Class. It is meant to handle both small and very large, multi and single fasta files. As ussual its initial version will be soooo much less ambitious.

Author:
MGarber
